Property.name: ADC_WIDTH_BITS
Property.description: Number of bits in each of the I and Q values received from the ADC device.

Property.name: ADC_INPUT_IS_LSB_OF_OUT_PORT
Property.description: Indicates whether ADC data is justified to most significant or least significant ADC_WIDTH_BITS of the out port. When value is false, sign extension occurs.

Property.name: overrun_sticky_error
Property.description: Sticky bit indication of samples overrun.

Property.name: samp_count_before_first_samp_drop
Property.description: Number of samples before the first dropped sample.

Property.name: suppress_discontinuity_opcode
Property.description: Writing true suppresses the worker from sending sync opcodes
